resources.string:
AI-Droid is a club we recently established. In this club, you'll have the opportunity to learn how to create apps using Android Studio.

 We named our club AI-Droid because we'll also focus on developing machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) models, which we'll later integrate into our apps.

 Additionally, we'll teach you how to create better UI/UX designs, use GitHub, implement NoSQL for cloud storage, and explore other relevant technologies when possible.

 Join our club to create and share fun, professional apps with your friends!

 Pre-requisites: Basics of Java
